description:
Can’t decide which outfit to pack? Take them both! At a cavernous 100L, the Boundary Hardcase Roller has room to pack for most adventures. From ski boots and a helmet, to your trad rack, to all the clothes you could need for a few weeks or exploring. A removeable divider with zippered compartments helps keep your gear exactly where you want it, until you need it. Equipped with 4 swiveling wheels, this case turns on a dime, a nice feature when dodging weary travellers on the way to a distant gate. And, the hard shell design helps protect your packables in cramped cargo holds.

  • Polycarbonate hard shell construction is rugged, durable, and helps keep your belongings safe
  • 4 swivel wheels give you mobility options and handle much better than standard 2-wheeled cases
  • Removeable inner divider snaps in and out, and lets you compartmentalize your packing, or take it out when packing larger items
  • Removable divider has zippered compartments that are great for toiletries, cables, chargers, etc
  • Light blue contrast lining makes it easy to spot that one thing you need
  • Lining has a DWR finish, so it stays clean longer, and makes any spills easier to clean up
  • Ribbed outside helps keep your case right side on conveyor belts and luggage racks
  • Push-button telescoping pull handle
  • Grab handles on side and top for moving onto buses or conveyor belts
name: MEC Boundary Hardcase Roller 100L
